name: Defend Greater Yemen
description: In the wake of the Weltkrieg and the fall of the British Empire, Yemen has never been stronger. Defending our current form must be top priority, along with ensuring we are free from the Ottoman Empire.

name: Consolidate The Hinterlands
description: Yemen, particularly in the south is sparsely populated outside of it's coastlines and major ports. We must ensure they regions are consolidated and made for better living.

name: Rally the Tribesmen
description: War is brewing in the Middle East and Turkish arms may very soon not see itself the dominant force they have been for the last few decades. As the other Arabs gather their tribesmen, we should be wise to follow suit.

name: Minorities Census
description: While Yemen is known to have minority cultures before the border expansion, the recent territorial expansion has increased the size of these minorities. Holding a census will help us figure out how to treat the new minorities in our country.

name: Religious Autonomy
description: Religious Autonomy has been enjoyed across Yemen going back to before the deal with the Ottomans, this deal is even more beneficial to us given our massive land grabs in recent years.

name: Encourage Zaydi Faith
description: With our massive expansions in the past few years we have seen the Zaydi faith become a smaller and smaller demographic in our own nation. This must be rectified.

name: Take Powers From Ottomans
description: Ottoman officials still hold many seats within our governments and jobs, removing them will help lower the influence they hold over our people and country.

name: Expand Postal Service
description: Spreading information throughout Yemen has been a struggle not only due to the lack of roads and infrastructure, but also the small postal industry to spread news about events in the country. Expanding it will help us clearing explain what is going on to our people.

name: Create Yemeni Gendarmes
description: With the rise of rebel groups once again, we must ensure the safety of the Imam against the threat. Creating the Gendarmes should help us suppress rebellious sentiment in the capital.

name: Dealing with Rebel Remnants
description: Although rebel groups were thought to be dealt with previously, the problem rose up again when the rebels that fled from Sana'a into Asir were provoked by people fleeing from Hejaz. Now that we own Asir and the rebels are active again, we have to deal with them one way or another.

name: Declare the Mutawakkilite Kingdom
description: With our preparations complete, we can declare ourselves an independent kingdom when the Ottomans are in their most dire situation.

name: Modern Constructions
description: The methods of our current construction are long and outdated, and don't work well for the modern setting. Reforming our construction policies could be a good start in building Yemen for the future.

name: New Aden Rail Lines
description: The Aden Railway was built by the British in 1916 in order to help the transportation of supplies within the region. While the railway still has its uses, it is in desperate need of an update to be used effectively.

name: Red Sea Railways
description: The Red Sea has been a hub for Yemeni profit ever since the beginning of the millennium, generating great profit. Expanding railways should help increase the profit we get from the region.

name: Populate the Hinterlands
description: Despite our best efforts, the Hinterlands in the south of Yemen are still as empty and barren as ever. Making the region easier to commute to should help the region's population grow over time.

name: Expand Aden's Trade Influence
description: With the colonisation of the Hinterlands in Aden, Aden will soon become a place for commercial profit for Yemen.

name: Aden Goods Production
description: The goods we got through the Aden trade reveal new things not known before revealed by the foreign traders. Using this new-found knowledge and materials, we can expand Aden's industry further.

name: Study Foreign Plans
description: While we could try and make our own plan for the economy, surely powers who have already gone through the same problems as us before have plans that will work towards modernising the country.

name: End the Economic Downturn
description: Although Black Monday affected us much less than other countries due to our disconnect from Germany, some of it's ripples have still managed to affect us. Solving these should help bring some light to our already poor economy.

name: Import Industrial Tools
description: Our country very much shows the way the old world was, with many of our methods of doing everyday things being outdated. This includes the tools our workers use on a daily basis. Importing tools from beyond should help in making the lives of the workers easier.

name: Prospect for Oil
description: While we have managed to touch down upon light amounts of oil within Yemen, there has yet to be enough for us to actually generate profit. Perhaps searching for some more could bring unexpected results.

name: Support Farming Industry
description: The farming industry in Yemen is where a lot of the everyday population lies, especially in more sparsely populated areas. We need to ensure the industry remains up to date with the current standards set by the modern world.

name: Modern Economy
description: Through various reforms, plight, and crises, Yemen has been able to learn and build up from all these trouble-some experiences. Yemen now stands proud with other European countries, with its newly reforged economy.

name: Return of the 40 Officers
description: The 40 Officers are a group sent to our government to the Ottoman Empire in order to learn their way of training. Perhaps it is about time we tell them to return?

name: Metal Convoys
description: Trade fleets have been key to Economic success for centuries, and ours needs the best ships we can muster to have any influence in this trade rich sea.

name: Establish A Merchant Marine
description: Merchant Marines are used to defend merchant ships and trade, and are used by many countries now. Establishing a Yemeni merchant marine should hopefully increase the profit of our bountiful trade.

name: Protect the New Merchant Fleet
description: With the Yemeni Merchant Marine established, we need to ensure they can get whatever they need to go without any interruption.

name: Build Up the Port of Aden
description: Aden is one of our most profitable ports and is where the majority of our income comes from. With the newly established Merchant Marine, expanding the port can maximise our trading profit.

name: Commission a Flagship
description: Flagships are used as a point of national prides for countries, as it is their biggest and best ship that they send into battles. Taking a foreign design and making it our own can help boost our nationalism.

name: New Rifle Designs
description: Thee current design of our rifle is long outdated and ineffective for modern day combat, creating a new design for our army is of the utmost importance.

name: Import Artillery
description: Our country currently lacks any semblance of an artillery design, and is used nowhere within the army. Importing artillery from beyond can put us one step ahead of our dangerous neighbours.

name: Fortify Asir
description: Asir is where the majority of fighting will be going on with our Ottoman overlords and the Nejd Emirate to the north, so protecting it along with the rest of the country is our highest priority.

name: Professional Mountaineers
description: Yemen in various areas has very mountainous landscape that can end up being hard to traverse, however we can turn this into an advantage. Teaching specific regiments of men how to effectively fight in these mountains can put us a step above our in-experienced enemies.

name: Arabian Horsemen
description: Cavalry is seen as a highly outdated form of fighting within the 'modern world', but it still has a place within the Middle East due to the vast deserts covering it. Ensuring we can master this art is crucial for Middle-Eastern warfare.

name: Military Support
description: Raising a truly modern military requires men in the backlines to back it up, also known as support units. Things like hospitals and engineers can help specialise our forces for specific needs and circumstances.

name: Study Trench Warfare
description: Trench warfare was mainly used in the Weltkrieg and has been proven to work. Since the modern doctrine has not been tested on the scale of the Weltkrieg yet, trench warfare is the safer bet to use until a later date.

name: Military Engineering
description: Guns, especially our slightly outdated design, have a tendency to fail at the most inconvenient and unexpected times, and can decide the fate of a battle. Having trusted mechanics and engineers on the ready can help reverse this effect.

name: Planning In Advance
description: We shall make plans for war against nations before they have begun, and open up a whole wing for our military experts and members of government to make plans and debate them.

name: Riflemakers and Gunsmith Guilds
description: Guilds are a way for many gunsmiths and riflemakers to meet up and come up with new designs, which is highly beneficial.

name: Found the Ta'izz Arsenal
description: The Fledgling industrial zone of Ta'izz is the perfect spot to found our first plant for heavy guns production.

name: Modernised Armed Forces
description: Through various reforms, foreign studies, and developments of our own, Yemen is now ready to show off it's modern military to the other powers of the world.

name: Military Science
description: Modern military science continues to advance. We must train the next generation of minds to keep pace and advance our own military thought and leadership to keep the army of Yemen on top.

name: Free Kingdom
description: With our liberation from the corrupt Ottoman Empire, we can now move onto the future as a Yemeni Kingdom.

name: Claim Dhofar
description: With Greater Yemen becoming very close to reality, the last part we need is Dhofar, currently owned by the isolationist Oman.

name: Desperate Struggle
description: With Our Military returning fresh from fighting the Turkish oppressors, the unsavory elements of society have risen up and struck us with our backs turned. The Battle for Yemen has Begun.

name: Chaos in The Cities
description: The rebellion has reached new heights never seen before, it is nearing warlike conditions nationwide.

name: Rebels Crushed
description: Despite the rebels fervor and devotion, our loyal military has managed to stamp out the last flames of rebellion. This should hopefully lead to a future of peace for Yemen.

name: Control the State
description: The new political climate of Yemen requires the complete and utter cooperation of our people.

name: Efficient Rule
description: The Imam has his whole life devoted himself to Yemen, Impressing statesmen from across the globe. His rule shall be hailed as one of progress and efficiency.

name: Devoted Sovereign
description: The king now remains as the final authority within Yemen, with no one being able to stand in his way. All people will look up to him and his excellent rule.

name: Humane and Just
description: A foreign man once noted the Imam's methods as 'Humane and Patriarchal'. Such is his rule seen to his loyal subjects as Humane and Just.

name: Military Roads
description: Reconstructing roads within the country to be built for the military will help troops reach where they need to be more efficiently.

name: The Heart of Yemen
description: Sana'a is the heart and home of the Yemeni people, where all roads begin and end. We must build it up further to ensure it's glory stays.

name: Unified Economy
description: The economy within Yemen was hit hard by the effects of Black Monday, and many lessons have been learned. Now we can attempt to reunify the economy.

name: Advanced Communications
description: Radar is a rather recent innovation in the western world which helps thinks like troops, ships, and planes detect enemy movement. Studying this technology could allow all corners of Yemen to be overseen from Sana'a.

name: Prepared Army
description: Our soldiers are loyal to the Imam and ready to fight for his cause at any time.

name: Sole and Final Authority
description: The Imam of Yemen will work as the sole and final authority in all of Yemen, with everything done with the government being approved by him.

name: End the Imammate
description: It is time to liberate the Yemeni people and allow for Yemen to be free! The First Republic of Yemen is declared!

name: Hold Elections
description: With the liberation of the country, it is now time for Yemen to hold its first elections. The two competing are the Shabab Al-Amr and the Hait al-Nadial, with both having a good chance of winning.

name: Conservative Republic
description: With the victory of the first Yemeni election being the Hait al-Nadial party, the foundation of the Republic will be built with a Conservative mindset and structure.

name: Reaffirm Common Law
description: Common Law, or Sharia Law, forms the Backbone of laws in the Muslim world. We shall hold true to our traditions and build our republic from these values.

name: Presidential Powers
description: The next step to establishing peace within the new Republic is to Appoint a President to fill the Power Vacuum left by the Imam.

name: Cash Crop Trade
description: Many crops like near Yemen's coast with farmers constantly labouring for them. Some of these are more exclusive to our geographical area, and could be sold for cash.

name: Centre of the Red Sea
description: The Red Sea is an area we desperately need to protect if we want to ensure we keep our many trade profits, but our currently sub-par navy cannot achieve this.

name: Trade With Europe
description: With our key location beyond the Suez canal and through the Red Sea, Europeans trading with us can help us exploit our excellent geographic position.

name: Liberal Republic
description: With the victory of the first Yemeni election being the Shabab al-Amr, the foundation of the Republic will be built with a Liberal mindset and structure.

name: Modernise Laws
description: Yemen's laws still contain many authoritarian practices and outdated imperialist constructs within them, and are in desperate need of a revamp.

name: Regional Rule
description: With the victory of the Liberal party, we can end the autocracy of Sana'a, and bring the power of Yemen back to the whole nation. Removing more power from the central government and moving it to regional government can help ensure this.

name: Electrification
description: Nearly all of Yemen is without the benefits of the marvel of electric lighting. If we are to enlighten the people we must light up the nation.

name: New Development
description: With the rapid development across Yemen, we can begin to expand the industry for our people. Our moves here will be the foundation of our new Yemen.

name: Begin Industrialisation
description: With the constitution clarified and the industry being built upon, Yemen can begin to industrialize itself into the future. This will be a lengthy and tough process, but the modernisation of the country could bring miracles into the future.

name: Islamic Constitution
description: While we have been liberated from the monarchy, our nation's identity is still built upon Islamic ideas and principles. With our country ready, we can clarify the contents of such a constitution built upon the Islam, and the Zaydi faith.

name: Local Representatives
description: While Yemen is largely united, each area in Yemen contains various minorities and tribes, especially in the south. Assigning representatives to represent the needs of each of these people-groups will allow us to properly govern the country.

name: Welcome Intellectuals
description: Yemen Stands as a Beacon of Free Thought and Expression in a sea of Oppressive fearful monarchies. Already intellectuals pour in from across the neighbouring lands seeking Asylum.

name: Begin Nahda
description: Nahda is much like the Renaissance of the western world but centred around the Islam faith. With it supporting things like Pan-Islamist thought and Anti-Colonialism, it will be important for building our country into the future.

name: Political Liberties
description: Our people should be able to freely speak their minds on various issues involving the government and its policies, and help us construct the government properly.

name: Pan Arabist Thought
description: With our various modernisations and the embracing of Nahda, originally Pan-Islamic thought has evolved into specifically Pan-Arabist thought. This thought process can help our government and country work towards a future where this is possible.

name: Rassid Arabia
description: With us managing to secure our independence against the Ottoman and Arabian threat, we have managed to unite Arabia under our own banner. While consolidating large swathes of land will be a difficult process, we can now officially declare Rassid Arabia.

name: Damage Control
description: The damage caused by our war with the former Arabia has caused devastation within many parts of our new lands and old. We must limit the damage by containing it wherever we can.

name: Rebuild and Heal
description: The people in the new lands are hardly culturally Yemeni, and integrating Yemeni culture within the Arabian ideal will be a long and arduous process.

name: Mobilise the Military as Police
description: With the majority of local threats gone, we can safely begin to mobilise the military as police within our country in order to calm the unrest.

name: Crackdown on Dissent
description: With the mobilisation of the police, cracking down on disloyalty and local tribes has become a much easier job.

name: Appease Tribes
description: Many local tribes lie within the sparsely populated areas of Arabia, and act independently from our government. We'll need to compensate these tribes if we want our government to be recognized by them.

name: Purge the Saudis
description: The Saudi dynasty tried to our country and dynasty, and we will respond in kind. No mercy will be shown to the Saudi family, who threatened our country, people, and Imam.

name: Give Religious Freedom
description: Yemen itself follows a very different sect of Islam compared to the rest of Arabia, and it would be difficult to convert everyone to our point of view. Ensuring they can practice their religions in peace should work as an alternate solution.

name: Begin Integration
description: Through our many reforms, we can begin the integration of many parts of Arabia. This will only be the beginning of an even longer process.

name: New Administration
description: With unrest mainly gone, we can sort the administration of our vast expanse of territory.

name: Welcome the Rashids Back
description: The Rashid Dynasty of Jabal Shammar was defeated by the Saudi's and is related to ours. Letting them have a seat in our government will show both good courtesy and help improve our Arabian bonds.

name: Complete the Integration
description: With all processes done and over with, we can now become more than Rassid Arabia in name, and make our people see themselves as people within Rassid Arabia as well.
